CustomField.description: When Status = Mobilisation, return Pending + Active Annual Gross Margin. When Status = Terminated return Active at Termination Annual Gross Margin. All other statuses return Active Annual Gross Margin.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Status__c, "Mobilisation", Pending_Annual_Gross_Margin__c + Active_Annual_Gross_Margin__c, "Terminated", Active_at_Termination_Gross_Margin__c, Active_Annual_Gross_Margin__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Note: Actual Values do not include Pending Line Items outside of the Mobilisation Contract Status.
CustomField.label: Actual Annual Gross Margin
